meanings.definition: Directed too much or too closely.
meanings.sent1: The overdirected child followed every instruction without question.
meanings.sent2: The overdirected camera zoomed in too close to capture the full scene.
meanings.sent3: The overdirected GPS kept telling us to turn around in circles.
meanings.sent4: Her overdirected focus on perfection made her miss the beauty in imperfection.
meanings.sent5: The overdirected sunlight blinded us with its intensity.

meanings.sent1: Feeling overdirected, he wished for some freedom to make his own choices.
meanings.sent2: The overdirected student felt suffocated by the constant supervision.
meanings.sent3: The overdirected chef followed the recipe so closely that he forgot to add salt.
meanings.sent4: Her overdirected schedule left no room for spontaneity or fun.
meanings.sent5: The overdirected team lost their creativity under the strict guidance of their coach.
